Text:
Due to the attack, part of the academy buildings were
destroyed, so summer vacation started early so that
repairs can be completed.
(Oh, I must hurry.)

Unable to conceal her sense of restlessness and
anticipation, Rose hurries along the path to the
block of dorms.

(I never expected the attack to have this kind of
impact.)
(Although it could also be said that we are lucky.)

(Thanks to the summer holidays starting early,
the student council elections—which normally
take place at the end of the academic year—
had to be postponed.)

(The new election schedule will now take place
shortly after the start of the new semester...)
(In other words, Cid still has a chance to run for office!)

(If I could be on the student council together with
Cid, it would be like a gift from heaven.)

(But since Cid is so modest, even if he wanted to
join the council to be with me, he definitely can't
say so himself.)

(So I, Rose Oriana, need to give him a little
push...!)

(I need to tell him right here and now that I want
him to be a candidate for the next student council
election.)

(...A-And when it is clear that he will join the
council, after the meetings we can spend all
the time we want together! That's what Cid
would want⁠—right?)
Heehee... I'm really looking forward to it.
(Oh, but how am I going to tell him?)

(I am sure Cid knows about the election. He is
probably troubled about what he should do...)

(...Cid. We need to talk. You need to run in the
next election!)

(I guess it will be okay to tell him directly.
Something like, "Cid, I need your help."
Then he will understand.)
Wait for me, Cid...!

(I wonder if Cid will be surprised if I suddenly go
see him... I can't wait to see to see what kind of
delighted expression he makes⁠—)
Oh...?! That's...
Hm...? Pr-Princess Rose...!
(Claire Kagenou...!)

...Erm I don't mean to be rude, but why are you
here?
That's my line...your Highness.

(Claire...Cid's sister and potentially a future
knight of the Crimson Order.)

(She is known for her skill with the sword...and is
brilliant academically.)

(For Cid...she will take any risk. She cares deeply
for her family⁠—no, for her brother.)

(Seeing her standing before me, I feel my heart
pound in my chest, almost like it is burning...)

(Yes, I must admit to myself. I...am jealous of
Claire Kagenou...!)
(I'm not in any position to act on behalf of Cid...)

...Erm, Princess, are you here for some matter
as student president?

...O-Of course. I have business with Cid. Why are
you here, Claire?

Well... I'm simply here in the capacity of Big Sister.
I was hoping to spend some personal time with a
member of my family.
Oh, I see. That is a shame.
A shame...? What could you possibly mean...

Today I have official business as student president
with Cid, so I am afraid that takes priority over
your family time.
...Well, whatever it is, I can tell him for you.

After all, you must be super busy as student
president. No worries, I can handle this for you...!
Certainly not.

Even if you are his family, this is not something
that I can divulge to you. So please don't let this
concern you...!
If you will excuse me⁠—
Wait a sec! Princess, I was here to see Cid first!

...Claire, you do not have any urgent business with
Cid, am I correct? However, I do have very, very
urgent business with him.

That is not the point...! Today is the only day I
can meet Cid!

Hmph... In other words, you insist on getting in my
way!

Staring at each other, the two women begin eyeing the
distance between them. Their hands creep over to
the hilts of their swords. Things are about to blow.
Uh-oh, I got a bad feeling about this combo...
Huh?!

The shadow hits the ground running.
The person running is...
Ack... Cid! Hey, wait!
Cid?! Why are you running away?!
Crap, they're following me...!
Hey!!! Stop this instant!
Please stop, Cid...!

With that, Cid is on the run, and Rose and Claire are
in close pursuit. A game of hide-and-seek between
the three is on!
